ing: 1 (7 ounce) jar stuffed green olives, with liquid
n: Green Bean and Stuffed Olive Salad
des: "Cool marinated summer salad for olive lovers. Easy and pretty enough for a party."
ins: Place the green beans and onion in a large resealable plastic bag. Pour in the olives and liquid. Seal bag, and marinate at least 1 hour, turning occasionally. Serve over lettuce leaves, and sprinkle with bacon bits.
